resources.name: Syntax
resources.description: Full Stack Developers Wes Bos and Scott Tolinski dive deep into web development topics, explaining how they work and talking about their own experiences.

resources.name: Datacamp
resources.description: DataCamp offers interactive R, Python, Sheets, SQL and shell courses. All on topics in data science, statistics and machine learning.

resources.name: Notion
resources.description: A tool that blends your everyday work apps into one. It's the all-in-one workspace for you and your team. Write, plan, collaborate, and get organized

resources.name: Animal Crossing
resources.description: Escape to a deserted island and create your own paradise as you explore, create, and customize in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game.
